caption.title: Information of yellow fever virus (YFV) sequences included in the dataset.
caption.p: ID: identification. YFV: yellow fever virus. NHP: non-human primate. NA: not available. This dataset included 112 YFV nucleotide (nt) sequences, spanning 621 nt (from the nucleotide 1,766 to 2,386 of MK333808.1 sequence) from South American and African genotypes.
Click here for additional data file.
